name: Under Construction (Redslash12)
description:
A project I've been working on for a while now. It was getting a bit tedious so I'm splitting into multiple parts. Here I present Part One of Under Construction! Its about 1-2 hours. I am planning to finish the series but don't hold your breath for a release anytime soon! 

Also, if you use RPGMaker MV, please feel free to use any included RS12 custom scripts. I wrote them. They aren't perfect.
